# methodName

**Instance Property**

The identifier for the payment method to use for the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute DOMString methodName;
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/PaymentMethodChangeEvent/methodName] for Apple Pay transactions is the Apple Pay URL.

For more information, see [https://www.w3.org/TR/payment-method-id/#dfn-pmi].

## Change Information

- **methodDetails**: A dictionary that contains the details of the change.

items.description: A dictionary that contains the details of the change.
